optOut.waitForThenClick: body > div#cookie-banner > div:not([id]) > div#cookie-info > div:nth-child(2)#cookie-decline > a:not([id])

test.waitForVisible: body > div#cookie-banner > div:not([id]) > div#cookie-info > div:nth-child(2)#cookie-decline > a:not([id])
